author: Financial News
title: Blockchain eyed as boost for cross-border investment
text:
Follow @annairrera 05 October 2015 Some senior finance executives are warming to the idea that blockchain technology could be a catalyst for greater integration of Europeâ€™s financial markets by helping break down some of the long-standing barriers to cross-border investment.
